commentary: 4.41 Yogasannyastakarmanaam one who has renounced actions by Yoga? Jnanasanchinnasanshayam one whose doubts are rent asunder by knowledge? Atmavantam possessing the self? Not not? Karmani actions? bind bind? Dhananjaya O Dhananjaya.Commentary Sri Madhusudana Sarasvati explains Atmavantam as always watchful.He who has attained to Selfrealization renounces all actions by means of Yoga or the knowledge of Brahman.
